name: Blade Bumerang
description: Attack and you'll end up right were you started, except if you managed to snatch an enemy! In that case, you'll be thrown into the opposite direction of your attack. Use this to clear canyons, make your way up walls and cover big distances. This is very early stuff, so there are no sound effects. I would still love to know wether you think the controls work well, wether the level design could be improved, or if you have something to critique in the art department. But don't get me wrong, this demo should still be fun, even though you might encounter a bug. If you do, tell me all about it!
